ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: Crawling with custom meta-data
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a hoppath.pl script provided with Heritrix (at least 1.10) in the bin dir. I have not used this but I believe it is supposed to do exactly what you
